name: Threedom
overview:
Threedom is the worldâ€™s simplest smartphone.

Many so-called ‘smart’ phones are still difficult to use for large numbers of people due to overly-complex navigation, small tap areas, and confusing mental models. For people with dexterity or cognitive issues, current mobile interfaces become even more difficult to use.

Given this, Threedom offers a unique, bold, three-button interface that allows for easy navigation through friends, texts, music, photos and more.

Not only does Threedom make everyday phone use clear and understandable, it does so in an aspirational, elegant way. And this is one of its key strengths: a phone for people with accessibility issues that doesn’t look like a phone for people with accessibility issues.

We firmly believe that in Threedom, we’ve created a product that will shake up a number of markets (seniors, kids, technophobes and those craving a return to simplicity) and benefit many lives as a result.
